ApplicationDescription: A powerful text editor and IDE.

Connections.Purpose: Used when fetching release notes, submitting feedback, and linking to help documentation.
Connections.DenyConsequences: Release notes, submitting feedback, and help documentation will be unavailable.

Connections.Purpose: Used when requesting app update announcements.
Connections.DenyConsequences: App update announcements will be unavailable.

Connections.Purpose: Used when managing your app license information.
Connections.DenyConsequences: Access to app license management will be unavailable.

Connections.Purpose: Used when browsing, installing, or uploading extensions in the Nova Extension Library.
Connections.DenyConsequences: Browsing, downloading, and updating extensions will be unavailable, as well as uploading extensions (for extension developers).

Connections.Purpose: Used when checking for and downloading app updates as well as unlocking your license.
Connections.DenyConsequences: Automatic app updates and license unlocking will be unavailable.

Connections.Purpose: Used when fetching help documentation.
Connections.DenyConsequences: Help documentation will be unavailable.

Connections.Purpose: Used for the Panic Sync service, which includes syncing data between your devices.
Connections.DenyConsequences: All features using the Panic Sync service will be unavailable.

Connections.Purpose: Gathering of diagnostic reports (crash reports) and analytics, if either or both of those options are opted-in in Preferences.
Connections.DenyConsequences: Automatic submission of diagnostic reports and analytics will be unavailable.
